full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA GCIG 'JAM DPL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR @005B ZER BDE PA LA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS PA MANG PO YOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL KYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG SNYING MA RNYING DANG, SNGA MA NAS DON GNYER CAN BKA' BSKUL ZHING, SPYIR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYI SBYIN BDAG GIS RIM 'GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I DANG PO CHOG PAR, ,RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AE SRIR SNYAMS PA SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BYON SNYING KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BSTEN NAS SUG BRIS BGYIS PA'O, ,)
